project(mbed-classic)

# indirectly, including ourself)

include_directories("/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/yotta_modules/mbed-classic")


# recurse into dependencies that aren't built elsewhere



# And others (typically CMSIS implementations) need to export non-system header
# files. Please don't use this facility. Please. It's much, much better to fix
# implementations that import these headers to import them using the full path.
include_directories("/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/api")
include_directories("/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/hal")
include_directories("/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/targets/hal")
include_directories("/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/targets/cmsis")


# modules with custom CMake build systems may append to the
# YOTTA_GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS property to add compile-time-determined include
# directories:
get_property(GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS GLOBAL PROPERTY YOTTA_GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS)
include_directories(${GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Provide versions of all the components we depend on, the corresponding
# preprocessor definitions are generated in yotta_config.h
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_STRING "0.0.4")
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_MAJOR 0)
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_MINOR 0)
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_PATCH 4)

# delegate to an existing CMakeLists.txt:

    "/Users/brian/files/projects/microbitscratch/bitscratch-vm/yotta_modules/mbed-classic"
